Package edu.cnm.deepdive.nasaapod.service

Interfaces and classes declaring/implementing services for background processing (for database operations, file operations, and web service requests) and fragment management.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ApodWebService
    Declares the ApodWebService.get(String, String) Retrofit service method () for communicating with the NASA APOD web service, and defines nested classes in support of making these requests and deserializing the JSON data returned.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApodDBService
    Provides a service layer for accessing the ApodDB Room/SQLite database.
    ApodDBService.DeleteApodTask
    Implements an asynchronous DELETE of one or more Access instances from the local database.
    ApodDBService.InsertAccessTask
    Implements an asynchronous INSERT of one or more Access instances into the local database.
    ApodDBService.InsertApodTask
    Implements an asynchronous INSERT of one or more Apod instances, with related Access instances, into the local database.
    ApodDBService.SelectAllApodTask
    Implements an asynchronous SELECT of all Apod instances (sorted in descending date order) from the local database.
    ApodDBService.SelectAllApodWithAccessesTask  
    ApodDBService.SelectApodTask
    Implements an asynchronous SELECT of a single Apod instance, and an INSERT of a related Access instance, in the local database.
    ApodWebService.DateJsonConverter
    Provides serialization/deserialization for using the Date (date-only) class with Gson.
    ApodWebService.GetFromNasaTask
    Encapsulates the request lifecycle for the NASA APOD web service as a BaseFluentAsyncTask subclass.
    ApodWebService.InstanceHolder
    Implements the initialization-on-demand holder idiom for a singleton of ApodWebService.
    FileStorageService
    Encapsulates several operations on files in internal and external storage, including writing data from remote URLs to local files.
    FragmentService
    Provides app-wide fragment management services, intended primarily for use in apps without extensive back stack requirements, where a NavigationView or BottomNavigationView is used to move between the primary UI fragments.

Package edu.cnm.deepdive.nasaapod.service Description

Interfaces and classes declaring/implementing services for background processing (for database operations, file operations, and web service requests) and fragment management.
